website_summaries.verdict: Fast printing through a WiFi or NFC connection. Uses innovative dye transfer printing method.
pros: Offered in 3 different printer body colors
Add the Kodak app to your mobile device to make minor edits to the photos before you print them
Dye transfer printing technology is able to hold its full color for several years, and many users appreciate the color quality
cons: You're limited to 1 size of prints
Kodak portable printer is larger than other models

website_summaries.verdict: The Kodak Photo Printer Mini is a tiny printer that can be slipped in a pocket for easy wallet-size prints from mobile devices. Just beware that those prints are going to cost you much more than you would pay at the drug store.
pros: Can print from iOS or Android devices
Easy integration with Facebook, Instagram, and Google Photos
cons: Can only print from smart phones and tablets

customer_reviews.title: Faulty + not working as advertised - Item returned
customer_reviews.text: Product description claims this is NFC compatible - it isn't (or ours is defective) Printed 6 photos before declaring that the cartridge needed replacing. Seriously? The replacements state they print 20 photos per cartridge but this can only manage 6? Pros: Photo quality is very good. The app is simple and easy to use. Cons: Photos take forever to print. Cartridges don't last as long as advertised. NFC doesn't work (or mine was faulty) The app has no troubleshooting features. The app has no way of seeing dates of photos, if that's important to you as it is to me. Item returned due to being faulty and not working as advertise.
customer_reviews.author: Joleoo

customer_reviews.title: its ok,,,,could b better
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt always print out a full clear picture since it has a line across the bottom and sometimes on top but it works ok i suppose,,,,,not the greatest but not the worst
customer_reviews.author: Nina Rendell

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Everyone is dumbfound by it!
customer_reviews.text: I Have nearly printed the cartridge supplied, great photos. Everyone has complimented it. I’ve been wanting to buy this item for a while was never sure how good it was. Lived up and beyond expectations. Some people may find its functions noisy and a little timely. I love these retro effoects top colour print and mechanism sounds. Personally prefer the shape and design of this model to the new products.
customer_reviews.author: Candice renham

customer_reviews.title: Great compact size & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great compact size & easy to use, would recommend this to friends and family and work colleagues
customer_reviews.author: GAVIN LENNON

customer_reviews.title: not very quick but good colors nice paper
customer_reviews.text: Handy little printer.not very quick but good colors nice paper. All in all good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great portable printer, love it!
customer_reviews.text: The printer is great and working well. I have used it for 3 weeks now but still in the original cartridge that came inside the printer. I have asked Kodak in the website if i can change a cartridge before it ends to switch to the stickers but didn't get an answer. The prints are going out at a credit card size, i though it will be bigger but the zink paper is smaller than that so i am happy. The quality is great but when i look up close i can see the lines in some pictures but not big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Shmulik Eilat

customer_reviews.title: Great little printer!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this printer and really like it. It was very easy to set up on my iPad with Wi Fi, just turned it on and went into settings. The Kodak printer popped up right away and then I added the password. It prints really great quality pictures.
customer_reviews.author: R. S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't come near this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst purchase ever! It started great and photo quality was amazing, but then it all went wrong. The printer stopped picking up paper. Or it would pick up paper and then have different colors. Awe full experience. I tried to contact Kodak customer service and they never came back to me. So a complete waste of money - both on the printer and 5 cartridges. Now I have to invest in a different printer...
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: I end up returning this item because the battery life was so terrible! I wanted to use this for a wedding ...
customer_reviews.text: First off, I end up returning this item because the battery life was so terrible! I wanted to use this for a wedding photo guest book, but the battery dies after 8 prints so that was definitely not going to work. Unfortunately, it is not recommended to charge and print at the same time so using an external battery was not an option. As for the print quality, the print is pretty good! I think this product is better for those who only need to print a hand full of photos at a time and have no problem waiting an hour or so in between recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Lamster

customer_reviews.title: Crappy product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because the price was right--BUT turns out you get what you pay for...It only has WiFi (not bluetoooth) and the WiFI keeps dropping making the process of printing annoying and tedious! In addition its noisy and it takes way too long to print! I am going to get the Sprocket printer instead...despite the little better quality in the Kodak prints, it's not enough to deal with the all the hassle of the Kodak printer.
customer_reviews.author: petitesP

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it, the printer printed approximately 8 to 10 pictures and then stopped working. The message on the app said the battery was too low to print but it was plugged into an outlet so go figure. I unplugged it, turned it off and then back on, but it still would not work. It also lost connection constantly requiring you to leave the app to go back to settings to reconnect and then back to the app to print. Very aggravating and VERY disappointing! Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Outdoor Lover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect photos for your wallet
customer_reviews.text: Love the mini-printer! I used up all the printer cartridges (about 30 prints) very quickly, because its so easy to print and people love the prints. In this age of digital photos and photo-sharing online, you have a thousand photos in your phone, but how often do you look at them. A printed photo you can put on the fridge door, by your bed, or in your wallet. These credit card size photos are PERFECT for wallets.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: Update 2/19/18 Contacted seller, was sent a new printer. This one works as it’s suppose to and the pictures are great. Love it. (Older review) The printer when it prints is amazing. Unfortunately it only stays charged (FROM GREEN) for max 10 mins. I’ll plug it in to charge and sometimes the red light won’t even come on. Have to hold the printer at weird angles in order for it to charge, even then the red light blinks on and off. Spotty charge.
customer_reviews.author: LittleLaydie551

customer_reviews.title: Eats cartridges & seller has a "return window."
customer_reviews.text: I've tried to contact the seller of the cartridges and I've tried to contact the seller of the item and apparently it's "past my return window." I bought it in May and tried to return it in June. I don't know if it's the cartridges or the printer, but I have to turn on and off the printer constantly, I've wasted $40 in cartridges and I might have wasted $90 on a printer. It's torn open cartridges three (3!!) times, from two different packages. It's printed just in yellow. It's jammed, it's not turned on, it's not held a charge and I am not happy. And now I'm stuck with it. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Leah

customer_reviews.title: Fixing a jam?
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice and it jammed on me. The pictures come out really good though and I really like this printer but I wish it didn't jam so fast. The instructions said if it jams up to turn it off and turn I back on and it will "unjam" the picture but that didn't happen and now it's stuck in there and I have no way of getting it out.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: The photos came out clear and nice. Isn't crisp nice but it's good and cute
customer_reviews.text: I think I'm being very generous for even giving it a 3 stars. It's portable. Convenient. But to print out each picture, it takes a full minute! It would first print it in red color, the yellow, then blue, then coating. The photos came out clear and nice. Isn't crisp nice but it's good and cute! Each cartridge allows 10 photos. So be warned!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Vuong

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery life, horrible app.
customer_reviews.text: It was between this printer and the HP Sprocket I only purchased Kodak for the size of the print. I absolutely regret it. Battery life is ridiculous. I'm able to print 1-2 pictures before it needs charging. The connection is horrible. And once you're able to connect your phone, it loses the connection very quickly. The app is not responsive and will freeze periodically. I'm using the printer with a Samsung S8 Plus...I'm truly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lee S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Printer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my parents and they absolutely love it. I debated over which mini-printer to buy for a while before finally settling on this one. They all seem to have very minimal differences, but I thought this one best value. I've seen some other reviews/complaints that the photo takes too long to print out, but my parents haven't had an issue with that. I also think the time it takes (which really, isn't very long at all) is worth it because the clarity and coloration of the photos are beautiful. That'll definitely depend on the quality of the photo when it was taken, but so far they have loved this printer.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: This item didn’t fulfilled my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my brother. The first time the cartridge got stuck so we decided to take out the paper(cyan,yellow,etc) and there was a printed image of someone I don’t even know. I think the printer wasn’t new because of that. Now I have to buy new cartridges
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Rico

customer_reviews.title: It's fun and nice to have physical pictures again
customer_reviews.text: It's a little finicky to get connected and the setting are not savable. For instance, for every image I want to print I have to set the Brightness 45%, Contrast 55%, and Saturation 55% for a normally exposed image. It's fun and nice to have physical pictures again. I paid $70 on Black Friday for it, I feel that is about right for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Excellent portable dye sub printer
customer_reviews.text: Truly excellent dye sub printer at s good price. The paper/ink packs also reasonably priced. It is slow as dye sub printers tend to be but the quality is excellent and the software interface works well with my iPhone 6.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Weinstein

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and produces really cute pictures, all 10 before it broke. Once it jams you are out of luck, The expensive cartridge is no longer good and after just 4 cartridges it’s hopelessly jammed. Because I use it very infrequently it is no longer supported by Kodak. Great idea but an absolute waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: kdw

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: it’s okay to use. Battery life runs out pretty quickly and the pictures aren’t super clear. The one thing that really left me unsatisfied was that sometimes the printer didn’t work correctly, like it would print the picture using two pieces of film instead of one so the picture would split into two or it would get stuck in the middle of the printing process and just shut off. A few pictures also got stuck in the printer and couldn’t be taken out until I pried out the printer cartridge. It also takes too long to print.
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: Easy Use with Quality Prints to Cherish
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this yesterday in preparing for my son's 12th birthday party. I tried it tonight and was amazed at how easy it was to set up and print out my tester page of my son when he was 2 yrs old. As you can see the quality is very good!
customer_reviews.author: Carin

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: Sweet little device churning out fab quality 'photographs' straight from my iphone. I've had one of these for a while now and initially the firmware was a bit wobbly but Kodak have responded and now after some updates the app is much more reliable. My only gripe isn't with this device itself but with Kodak for not making the film packs more widely available which keep their price artificially high, otherwise I would buy far more as handing friends an actual photo souvenir of a party or bbq is a fun thing to do.
customer_reviews.author: MrI3

customer_reviews.title: pretty but tiny
customer_reviews.text: The picture is really tiny, but the colors are good. It should include software to modify what is printed. I would not buy this again as I think it should print a larger picture at a minimum.
customer_reviews.author: Jacie

customer_reviews.title: No Sticky Paper
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to get this mini printer. I misread the description and thought it came with sticky backed paper. I returned the printer because no one could find the paper for refill. When i finally did, it was no longer available and didn't know if it would be. I know this is the original version of the printer so it's no surprise that the paper was nowhere to be found. It printed nicely, just needed the paper.
customer_reviews.author: Kenya Brown

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Travels well and pic quality is beautiful. More layout, border, and background options would definitely earn it that 5th Star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not charge
customer_reviews.text: I recieved my printer on time and excidedly went to charge it. However the printer I recieved will not get past 30% and therefore will not print claiming it is "too low." If the problem is fixed I will change my review.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Great mini printer!
customer_reviews.text: Great printer! Quality is great, only thing is it takes a little bit to set up and print, but other than that it is amazing! My friend had gotten a hp sprocket and even though I didn’t do a thorough investigation the Kodak printer seems to work much better! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: ____rene

customer_reviews.title: Rarely Works
customer_reviews.text: Would be wonderful if it actually worked. It will only print if the app works, well it's only worked twice since we've had it and we've had it for 4 months. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ARK

customer_reviews.title: Check the product when arrives
customer_reviews.text: I didnt get to get as far as actually using the printer because it was not working properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use without reading instruction. Nice photo. I used to own a film Kodak camera 30 years ago and always trust their brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Q.

customer_reviews.title: The app needs a serious overhaul and without it the printer is useless. I'm very disappointed that I've purchased this printer ...
customer_reviews.text: I dont know if the problem is with the printer or with the app that is needed to use this printer but I have been unable to get my android phone to show that the phone is connected to the printer. Even with a direct wifi connection where I can see that I am connected, the app will not register the connection which means that I can not print. The app needs a serious overhaul and without it the printer is useless. I'm very disappointed that I've purchased this printer and can not do anything with it.
customer_reviews.author: Desarae

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I brought it for my granddaughter and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Allison

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Prints very nice colors but it started getting really noisy! Every time I print a bit noisier..
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great mini printer
customer_reviews.text: The Kodak prints so much better than the Sprocket. The colors are vibrant and true to life!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn K.

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality! Easy to use, prints very fast, lots of fun. Ideal for printing your favorite moments. Pictures are wallet size, so you can even give an instant gift. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: L. Berger

customer_reviews.title: Easy, portable, and great pictures!
customer_reviews.text: It took no time to set up (the NFC makes it really easy) and the pictures are gorgeous! And the charger for it is the mini USB so you should always have a charger somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Drake-Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Great color reproduction
customer_reviews.text: After tons of research on mini printers, i finslly decided on the Kodak. I am so glad I did! The color reproduction is very good! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Saniga

customer_reviews.title: printer stopped connecting to photo gallery
customer_reviews.text: printer quit connecting with photo gallery, so it will only print pictures you take.
customer_reviews.author: E. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. It is a little tricky to set up but worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: wasted the cartridges
customer_reviews.text: Barely worked, wasted the cartridges, battery life sucks, it's just horrible
customer_reviews.author: Frank Ojeda

customer_reviews.title: One of the best portable printers I ever used
customer_reviews.text: One of the best portable printers I ever used. Easy replacement for ink and sheets when needed also with amazing quality on the printed pictures as well.
customer_reviews.author: Drew&Macy

customer_reviews.title: Now you can share Picture from your phone.
customer_reviews.text: This is a Hoot. I enjoyed printing some good pictures,
customer_reviews.author: Edwin G.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this printer. The picture is great quality. This works perfectly with my iPhone 6s. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Smooch

customer_reviews.title: Picture Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've only printed a couple of times (so far), and am excited to use it again. I bought it so I can easily add photos to my journal. The two pictures I printed look amazing! I've had them in my journal for about a week, and they still look great.
customer_reviews.author: Firefly61

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine It's fast lots of fun to use ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine It's fast lots of fun to use colors are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for all my instant photo print needs~
customer_reviews.text: I was that kid that loved buying and using instant cameras. Of course back then I wasn't always making sure the lighting was perfect before I captured a moment. With this I can print all my beloved photos from my phone and edit them before printing. I've gone crazy and already used three cartridge packs, lol. And they're wallet size too so of course I'd print the heck out of my favorite photos and keep them safe in my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy the ability to print a picture either for myself ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked as described. Enjoy the ability to print a picture either for myself or for others while enjoying the moment. No need to go home to print.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this printer!!! It has been a wonderful experience from the moment I opened the box. The quality is amazing. I love the idea that the printer is rechargeable. The only thing is that it is a little loud when printing.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Portable Printer
customer_reviews.text: Small and simple to use portable printer. Feels solid. The 2.1 x 3.4 prints are equal to those of the Canon Selphy. The only negative is the expensive cartridges. I hope Kodak comes out with albums for this print size.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Velez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the service "as promised" would not hesitate using this vendor in the future.
customer_reviews.author: hughs

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit, great prints....However, very hard to find replacement cartridges. Should have bought a HP model instead.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Not very easy
customer_reviews.text: Really not as easy as they describe it. I followed the directions but still had a very hard time getting this thing to work. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Uh_nettie

customer_reviews.title: Neat
customer_reviews.text: Well done Kodak! This is a very cool little printer indeed, no problem connecting with my iphone and the results are crisp with pleasing colour rendition. The cost per print is a bit on the expensive side but that just makes me disciplined in what I print.
customer_reviews.author: MrI3

product_meta.title: Kodak PM 210 Thermal Sublimation Mini Portable Mobile Instant Photo Printer - Black
product_meta.description: Colour Name:BlackWish you could print your phone’s camera roll with the touch of a button? With the Photo Printer Mini by Kodak, you hardly have to lift a finger. Just tap your Android device on the surface of the printer, and innovative NFC one touch has you editing and printing photos in an instant. This smart gadget is also fully compatible with iOS phones and tablets over Wi-Fi network. Watch as the all-in-one ink and paper cartridge produces stunningly detailed color prints in convenient 2.1 x 3.4” size. Fade-proof dye transfer technology ensures each photo will last for at least 10 years with its humidity- and fingerprint-resistant properties. Best of all, access tons of editing features via the free Kodak app, including cropping, collage, special ID print, and more. Ready to start printing your precious memories? Just tap to get started! 1 KODAK PM-210 Photo Printer Mini Built-in Wi-Fi Direct NFC & Wi-Fi technology 1 micro charger cable 1 8 Photo Cartridge Powerful printing that fits in your palm! Photo size: 54mm x 86mm (credit card size) Unit measures 76.1 x 152.8 x 24mm Weighs in at 238g Main connection: Wi-Fi Direct NFC & Wi-Fi Input: Micro 5-pin for charging Supporting file: JPEG Printing method: Dye sublimation thermal transfer Gradation: 256 Gradations/16.7 million colors App available via Google Play & App Store Compatible Ink Cartridges: PMC-20, PMC-30, PMC-50, PMS-20 Tap your Android phone, or connect iOS device over Wi-Fi Wait for the Kodak app to launch, then explore editing options Touch the easy command to print in a matter of seconds Watch your gorgeous color portraits come to life
feature_bullets: EASY PRINT TECHNOLOGY Mini Smartphone Printer Lets You Print 2.1 X 3.4 Photos Direct From Android or iOS Device; No Cables or Buttons Necessary
WIRELESS CONVENIENCE NFC One Touch for Android Launches Kodak App to Print in Seconds; Also Compatible With iPhone or iPad Via WiFi Connection
HIGH QUALITY PHOTOS Innovative D2T2 Dye Transfer Method Produces Beautiful, Detailed Black White or Color Portraits That Dry Instantly and Stay Bright Up to 10 Yrs.
ALL IN ONE CONVENIENCE Innovative Kodak PMC Cartridges Combine Paper and Color Ink for Easy Maintenance; Purchase Refills in Increments of 20, 30 or 51
COMPANION APP Download the Kodak Photo Printer App for Filters, Cropping, Stickers, Card Templates, ID Photo Print, Video and SNS Print and More

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars223 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK
